water_gun.name: Water Gun
water_gun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

hydro_pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro_pump.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

surf.name: Surf
surf.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

ice_beam.name: Ice Beam
ice_beam.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

bubble_beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble_beam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
effects: 10% chance to lower Speed by 1 stage

water_pulse.name: Water Pulse
water_pulse.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

aurora_beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora_beam.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
effects: 10% chance to lower Attack by 1 stage

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.
effects: deals 1/16 max HP damage each turn

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stats.
effects: 10% chance to lower Speed by 1 stage

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
